actions: Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood, nourishes Jing and expels Wind from the skin by nourishing the Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, stabilizes Jing.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and opens the channels.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi and expels Wind.
Disperses deep Cold, warms the channels, unblocks the channels and vessels and assists the generation of Qi and Blood.
Dries Dampness, kills parasites and stops itching topically.

notes: Cut up and crush the ingredients then soak for ten days in 3000ml of a 75 percent alcohol solution. Filter off the liquid and apply to the affected area twice a day.
